item.title: European Leaders Meet in Paris as U.S. Pushes Ahead With Ukraine Plan
item.description: The hastily called gathering was part of a flurry of diplomacy expected to center on Ukraine this week as Trump officials prepare to start talks with ...

item.title: Keir Starmer Offers to Send U.K. Troops to Ukraine as Part of Peace Deal
item.description: Prime Minister Keir Starmer said for the first time on Sunday that he was “ready and willing” to deploy troops to help guarantee Ukraine’s security.

item.title: Pritam Singh, Singapore Opposition Leader, Found Guilty of Lying Under Oath
item.description: In a blow to the Workers’ Party, its leader, Pritam Singh, was fined for lying under oath to Parliament.

item.title: Rubio Lands in Saudi Arabia for Talks on Gaza and Ukraine

item.title: Palestinian Displacement in the West Bank Is Highest Since 1967, Experts Say
